0.1.name: wordpress/youtube-channel-slider
0.1.description:
Youtube Channel Slider displays your youtube channel videos either with excerpt or thumbnail image using slider. You can customize the slider in many ways (width, height, video per slide, no of videos to display & more).

It extract the thumbnail from videos in the youtube channel.

If you have a feature that you would like to get added in future versions, feel free to contact me at http://www.kesweh.com/contacto/.

If you find it useful please don't forget to rate this plugin.
